snippet: KROSS--Nathan, passed away peacefully on June 4th at the age of 92. Born in Ellenville, NY, a lover of farms and ice cream. He ran the family business Adelman Foods for more than 65 years. Beloved husband of Laura for 70 years, father of June, Ian and Peter. Wonderful Poppop to his granddaughters, Sara, Amanda and Elle, and his great-grandson Lachlan. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KROSS--Nathan, passed away peacefully on June 4th at the age of 92. Born in Ellenville, NY, a lover of farms and ice cream. He ran the family business Adelman Foods for more than 65 years. Beloved husband of Laura for 70 years, father of June, Ian and Peter. Wonderful Poppop to his granddaughters, Sara, Amanda and Elle, and his great-grandson Lachlan. 1/3
